# Tasks: Landing Page (Marketing + SEO)

**Input**: Design documents from `/specs/012-landing-page/`
**Prerequisites**: plan.md (complete), spec.md (v2.0 - UX Audit Remediation), research.md (complete), data-model.md (complete)
**Workflow**: Part of mandatory SpecKit workflow (Constitutional Principle XIII). Generated by `/speckit.tasks`.

**Tests**: Per Constitutional Principle XIV (TDD), tests are MANDATORY and MUST be written BEFORE implementation.

- Task format: `T###-test` (write failing test) ‚Üí `T###-impl` (make test pass)
- Coverage target: 80%+ for merge to main
- This feature is UI-focused; tests verify rendering, accessibility, and interactions

**Organization**: Tasks are grouped by user story to enable independent implementation and testing of each story.

## Format: `[ID] [P?] [Story] Description`

- **[P]**: Can run in parallel (different files, no dependencies)
- **[Story]**: Which user story this task belongs to (e.g., US1, US2)
- Include exact file paths in descriptions

---

## Phase 1: Setup (Shared Infrastructure)

**Purpose**: Widget directory structure and constants per plan.md

- [ ] T001 Create src/widgets/landing/ directory structure with subdirectories: hero-section/, demo-section/, how-it-works/, why-voidpay/, footer-cta/, hooks/, constants/
- [ ] T002 [P] Create src/widgets/landing/types.ts with TypeScript types: FeatureCard, WorkflowStep, NetworkBadge, DemoInvoice
- [ ] T003 [P] Create src/widgets/landing/constants/features.ts with 6 FeatureCards: No Database, Multi-Chain, Immutable, Aesthetic First, Instant Pay, Open Standard
- [ ] T004 [P] Create src/widgets/landing/constants/workflow-steps.ts with 3 WorkflowSteps: Create, Share, Get Paid
- [ ] T005 [P] Create src/widgets/landing/constants/demo-invoices.ts with 4 DemoInvoice variants (Ethereum, Arbitrum, Optimism, Polygon per FR-004)
- [ ] T006 [P] Create src/widgets/landing/constants/network-badges.ts with 4 NetworkBadge entries (Ethereum, Arbitrum, Optimism, Polygon)
- [ ] T007 Create src/widgets/landing/index.ts public API barrel export

---

## Phase 2: Foundational (Blocking Prerequisites)

**Purpose**: Hooks and utilities that ALL user stories depend on

**‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL**: No user story work can begin until this phase is complete

- [ ] T008 Create src/widgets/landing/hooks/use-interval.ts utility hook for demo rotation
- [ ] T009 Create src/widgets/landing/hooks/use-demo-rotation.ts with activeIndex, next, prev, pause, resume, isPaused state
- [ ] T010 Verify shared/ui components exist: AuroraText, HyperText, Button (glow/outline/void variants), Card, Heading, Text, motion
- [ ] T011 Verify useReducedMotion hook exists in src/shared/ui/hooks/use-reduced-motion.ts
- [ ] T012 Verify NetworkBackground widget exists for ambient backdrop

**Checkpoint**: Foundation ready - user story implementation can now begin

---

## Dependencies & Execution Order

### Phase Dependencies

```
Phase 1 (Setup)         ‚Üí No dependencies
Phase 2 (Foundational)  ‚Üí Depends on Phase 1 ‚Üí BLOCKS all user stories
Phase 3-8 (User Stories)‚Üí All depend on Phase 2
Phase 9 (Composition)   ‚Üí Depends on all widgets complete
Phase 10 (Polish)       ‚Üí Depends on Phase 9
Phase FINAL (Memory)    ‚Üí Depends on Phase 10
```

### User Story Dependencies

| Story | Priority | Depends On | Independent? |
|-------|----------|------------|--------------|
| US1   | P1       | Foundational only | ‚úÖ Yes |
| US2   | P1       | US1 (CTA in hero) + Foundational | ‚ö†Ô∏è FooterCta is independent |
| US3   | P2       | Foundational only | ‚úÖ Yes |
| US4   | P2       | Foundational + useDemoRotation | ‚úÖ Yes |
| US5   | P3       | All widgets created | ‚ùå No |
| US6   | P3       | Page composition | ‚ùå No |

### Parallel Opportunities

**Phase 1**: T002-T006 can all run in parallel (different files)

**Phase 3+4 (US1 + US2)**: Can run in parallel for independent components
```
[US1] HeroSection tests/impl ‚ïë [US2] FooterCta tests/impl
```

**Phase 5+6 (US3 + US4)**: Can run in parallel (different widgets)
```
[US3] HowItWorks + WhyVoidPay ‚ïë [US4] DemoSection
```

**Phase 10**: Lighthouse audits can run in parallel (T090 ‚ïë T091 ‚ïë T092)

| **US3 (P2)** | 21 (9 test + 12 impl) |
| **US4 (P2)** | 25 (11 test + 14 impl) |
| **US5 (P3)** | 21 (10 test + 11 impl) |
| **US6 (P3)** | 18 (8 test + 9 impl) |
| **Integration (Phase 9)** | 6 |
| **Polish (Phase 10)** | 14 |
| **Memory Updates** | 4 |
| **Parallel Opportunities** | 50+ tasks marked [P] |

**Suggested MVP Scope**: US1 + US2 (38 tasks) ‚Äî delivers hero with CTAs navigating to /create

**Format Validation**: ‚úÖ All tasks follow `- [ ] [TaskID] [P?] [Story?] Description with file path` format

---

## Notes

- **6 Feature Cards**: No Database, Multi-Chain, Immutable, Aesthetic First, Instant Pay, Open Standard (per FR-007)
- **4 Networks**: Ethereum, Arbitrum, Optimism, Polygon (per FR-004, aligns with Constitution MVP scope)
- **Button Sizes**: Primary CTA h-14 (56px), Footer CTA h-16 (64px)
- **InvoicePaper**: 794√ó1123px (A4 at 96 DPI, 1:1.414 ratio)
- **Demo Rotation**: 10000ms interval with pause on hover, 4-network cycle (40s full rotation)
- **View Gallery**: Scrolls to #demo section (gallery feature not in MVP)
- **Use This Template**: Calls `useCreatorStore.createNewDraft()` with DemoInvoice, navigates to /create
- **Animations**: All respect prefers-reduced-motion per FR-011
- **SEO**: Next.js Metadata API per FR-013
